title: Science of the Paranormal - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/17/22
itunes:title: Science of the Paranormal - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/17/22
description:
George Noory and Dr. Doug Matzke explore his research into paranormal phenomena such as remote viewing, precognition and deja vu, how he uses science to explain how they happen, and if God or intelligent design is behind the psychic abilities he claims we all have.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
